website_summaries.verdict: Unlike other mats, this model has a skid-resistant backing, so water doesn't leak through to the floor.
pros: Natural bamboo lattice with coating for looks and longevity
Mat does not saturate through to floor
cons: Some find the top of the mat slippery
If this happens, give it a quick scrub with soap and water to remove any oils from production or shipping

customer_reviews.title: DIY Project:
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bamboo mat to create a headboard for my king platform bed DIY project. The mat is beautiful and sturdy, project turned out GREAT! I’m buying some smaller bamboo mats to finish the nightstands. =)
customer_reviews.author: Jennelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried given the mix of reviews. But I’m so happy! I ordered this one to put at the door from the pool and the smaller runner (that’s to use outside a tub). Both look nice, not cheap. They do NOT SLIP on the tile, the antislip backing is great! They are NOT SLIPPERY when wet we come in with wet feet from the pool and they are great! There is absolutely NO ODOR. And they rolled out & laid flat nicely right out of the package. I’m going to order a couple more for other areas. I’m so glad I took the chance & ordered these.
customer_reviews.author: J & K Mac

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I hung it on the wall to cover a small plaster issue. It was perfect for the decor of the room. There are slight imperfections like slight gapping between slats but you have to be a perfectionist to really spot them.
customer_reviews.author: Sahara Skye

customer_reviews.title: Leaves residue on linoleum floors
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this if you have linoleum floors. The black underside rubs off on and leaves black residue on the floor, which is NOT broom-able. You have to scrub it off. If not for this, the product was as expected. However, I do wish the border was a different color. It was an odd shade. Not brown, not salmon, not burnt orange, not pink, strange color. I wish it were just a neutral.
customer_reviews.author: F. Kamrany

customer_reviews.title: Strange coating on bamboo
customer_reviews.text: Using as a shower mat outside the shower. I was not expecting this item to come with a finish on it as bamboo is naturally water resistant and more than capable of handling the environment in which I use it. The finish is quite sticky and sloppily applied. Every time I step on it with dry feet it sticks and ends up getting moved around the floor. Had I known about the strange finish, I probably would not have ordered it. You have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which is nice. I bought this because my cat has an ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot more plastic-y than I thought. I envisioned strips of bamboo, sanded out to be smooth. Instead it's very laminated and you can barely feel the individual reeds. But I also forgot or didn't know about the rubber non-slide backing on it, which is nice. I bought this because my cat has an obsession with peeing on bathroom rugs. Because this feel more like a laminated floor, it doesn't even register to him that it's a rug. It does add a little texture so I'm less likely to slip when stepping out of the bath, so... it's serving the intended purpose. I just wish it was more textured.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda S.

customer_reviews.title: Slippery When Wet
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a good sized slip and slide for in front of your shower - you have found it! I really like the thin profile, and it feels fine when dry, but I *hate* the way it feels when wet. I feel like I'm on a piece of saran wrap. Just don't do it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy-Michelle Reid

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing but complicated.
customer_reviews.text: Slippery when wet, be sure to place a towel below it because it doesn't stay in one place very well. Getting out of the shower bath is fine but reaching back in while your feet are on this mat may cause injury. It is aesthetically pleasing though, just needs more grip on the underside. Works better for outside my sauna then the bathroom because the sauna has carpet outside of it, so the may doesn't slip. If you are dead set on this item because it is aethetically pleasing then get a rubber non slip pad to place below.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased. I ordered this with a bit of trepidation. I thought it might be cold to bare feet, like strips of polished wood, and possibly slippery. I am surprised by how warm and soft it feels to stand on, and it isn't slippery when wet. It lays flat and not at all like "strips of wood sewn together." It has a very natural feel and look that goes well with my other wood decor. It seems durable and easy to clean, and it has a non-slip surface underneath. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JasonKilgore

customer_reviews.title: Slippery and slidey! :(
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as a bath mat. The bamboo looks nice but the mat doesn't feel good to step on if you’re wet/damp. It feels slippery. The mat itself has a fabric back and it doesn’t stay put so it slides around all over my tile. Overall, it didn’t feel safe to use as a bath mat so I stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Great idea
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo slats are put in in such a haphazard way that walking on them even in your socks the edges of the bamboo snag and pull up as shown in the photo. Also there were already chips in the bamboo coating. As you can see from the picture the border on the mat is not brown it is a strange pinky mauve color not so good. The quality of this mat is a very poor the stitching and the way that the border is put on is bumpy and not securely fastened. I would not recommend this mat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Even though these are nice mats, they didn't work for us in the kitchen. We will find another use for them or gift them. Due to their inability to absorb moisture our laminate floors were tracked by small moist spots. Not a product defect... just not what we were looking for. Would be great for a bathroom or patio.
customer_reviews.author: Doug C

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat
customer_reviews.text: This is not actually in my bathroom with a shower. I loved the look of it I put it in my half bath. It looks really nice. I have a lot of different elements going on in that bathroom. Nothing in that bathroom go togther but, so how it does. Anyway, I don’t slip around when I am getting ready. If I already didn’t have mats in my bathroom I would so recomemd this mat and, buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and the bamboo broke within a few weeks of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mountain wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Wow....Great area rug
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and ordered a bamboo floor mat for my kitchen (front of my oven). I have wood floors in my kitchen and this works great. It does not have rubberize backing it's more like clothes with very small dots that keep it from sliding, I also tried it in my bathroom and it's great on tile flooring and price is right. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M-C 42ITUS

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: When I first open the package. I can still smell the the painting. The mat doesn’t feel like made by bamboo. I set it on my porch for three days to get rid of the smell. I don’t know what kind of paint it was used because after so many weeks I can still smell The paint. I was using it as a play mat for my daughter so I’m kind of picky about it. If anyone just want to set it next to the lobby. The price is fair, worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Meh but Hubs likes
customer_reviews.text: Hubs (Alan) ordered these but doesn't do reviews. He loves bamboo. He put on the floor in our kitchen in front of the sink. Mostly stays in place but does nothing when water is spilled on it as it is not absorbent. Have to wipe it off. As far as durability goes I got a splinter on the bamboo in my foot the other day so wasn't too happy about that. I, personally would not order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Musielewicz

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUT NOT AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I purchased dark wood looking floor mats and this bamboo one. this one is the worst of the bunch and it never stays in one spot (stepping on it and walking away will move it) and it the least aesthetically appealing of the bunch. It works okay but not great.
customer_reviews.author: JoeSacramento

customer_reviews.title: Safe, doesn’t slip.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my older parents in their 70’s for something more Hygienic instead of those gross rugs! They weren’t sure, but they love it. Very safe, doesn’t slip. I bought some extra nonslip material by the roll but I won’t need it on tile. It is very long so that helps. It does have some cloth matting on the bottom so I’m not sure how long that will stay clean but just spraying it with white vinegar should keep it from molding. We are in California. Not sure about Washington or places that have lots of mold.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Best alternative to fabric bath matts
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should get bamboo matts for bathrooms. I've always had cloth ones and they either get dirty/ gross really fast, or start smelling like feet during the summer (house full of sweaty boys will do that). With this thing I just let my robo vac clean and then I mop it along with the floors. Doesn't get warped from water either.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: I purchased two of these mats 31/2 years ago to ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these mats 31/2 years ago to use at our Gulf Coast vacation rental property. They have been used consistently for over 40 months and they are just now starting to show wear but I think we will get another year of use from them. I will purchase them again. They do not slide on our tile floors and keep excess water off of the floor. Because they dry naturally or wipe dry with a towel, they save a lot of time and laundry for our cleaning crew.
customer_reviews.author: DeeAnna Esslinger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, durable, no slipping
customer_reviews.text: Went looking for bath mats that didn't absorb water, were easy to clean, and were slip resistant. Discovered these. I have a young child, so the first thing I did was pour water on them and try and see if I could make myself slip. Didn't slip at all. Also they grip my tile floor just enough that they stay in place, but you can still move them if you nudge them hard enough. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Walko

customer_reviews.title: Great mat.
customer_reviews.text: Such a perfect floor mat for camping! I set it in front of the tent to take off shoes before entering, and it is great. Super easy to shake off the dirt, and keeps the tent so much cleaner on the inside!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: This mat has a border that looks PURPLE!! It looks awful and dose not go with my bathroom colors! It has a terrible chemical smell also! I regret thus purchase! Buyer BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Ritta

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking Floor Mat
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted and got. We just installed a new cork floor in the kitchen and wanted to minimize the amount of water or grease that fell on the new floor. These mats fill the bill: they are well made, with a rubberized backing which keeps them in place, they are easy to move around the size of 2 ft by 4 ft is as advertised, and most importantly they go very well with the golden oak color cork floor. I so liked the three I bought, that I bought three more for future use for when ther original ones may need replacement
customer_reviews.author: George R

customer_reviews.title: fabric border is so ugly!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this last night and had high hopes, but wow that border they put around the outside edge is super ugly!! It ruins the whole thing. It does not lay nicely...it's all wrinkled up. And, the color of the fabric border is hideous...like a salmon pinkish. I was expecting a brown from the pics, but it is NOT brown. Anyway, trying to decide what to do with it. Keep it? Return it? Oh, decisions. Disappointed, all because of the ugly fabric border.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Borrowman

customer_reviews.title: Eh it’s alright. Small and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Should’ve looked at the dimensions. Much smaller than I thought but that’s My fault. Ended up using it for my dog bowls. Durable and easy to clean. Could use for a large adult‘s placemat.
customer_reviews.author: chris james

customer_reviews.title: Watch for manufacturing defects.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the materials is decent and the color quite nice. The bamboo was well-lacquered and there was no odor. Unfortunately, the binding on the mat I received had not been sewn well on one edge and the edges of two slats had cracked, so I returned it and ultimately decided to go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go beneath a pair of drying racks. It's the perfect size (slightly narrower than the distance between the racks' legs), rolls up nicely, and is easy to sweep clean with a hand broom. Exactly what I wanted after *months* of looking.
customer_reviews.author: 100 Watt Walrus

customer_reviews.title: No slip bottom!
customer_reviews.text: I like the simple design. I bought two of these for my bathroom. One for the vanity and I e in front of the tub. I wish they were just a little bigger. I like that they have a no slip bottom. I am happy with the purchase. They are nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Molly L

customer_reviews.title: Nice bathroom piece but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable to step on when I get out of the shower but a beautiful bamboo mat to add to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT Recommend/Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend, Highly disappointed!!! There are many flaws with the mat. Pieces of bamboo are not cut straight and defects in the bamboo strips that leaves gaps between the bamboo strips which makes the mat look cheap. Paid $24 for the 2x4 mat which is expensive considering the poor quality. I bought another mat from a private seller for $35, that was a high quality made, 4x6ft.
customer_reviews.author: WKT

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn’t absorb water
customer_reviews.text: It does really absorb any water but I haven’t slipped on it either. I bought it for the appearance knowing fully that I should probably just buy a normal clothe bath matt.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: OK, BAD DECISIONS
customer_reviews.text: Was experimenting with my loft's cement floor. Kinda "meh." The bamboo is heavily coated in urethane. Notable smell. I hope they do better and would order again. It looks like an oil slick now that is has been unfurled. I am trying really REALLY hard to make this work, but... doods.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Karwowski

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all of my life!?!?
customer_reviews.text: My daughter always soaks the bathmat and my bathroom smells wet and dirty. I even tried just using a towel and it was the same issue. This bathmat is amazing! It keeps dry and smells like bamboo 😁
customer_reviews.author: K. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great, light, very small imperfect
customer_reviews.text: You can see some glue left on the surface. But can be cleaned. Overall it's great, give my place elegant sense.
customer_reviews.author: D.E.Fox

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product in the kitchen by the sink and stove. I truly love these mats. Had a spill on one and was able to wipe it off clean. It is non skid. I am buying another set for my senior home.
customer_reviews.author: Pat K.

customer_reviews.title: I think they are going to be excellent
customer_reviews.text: They are going to be a runner for my hallway. I bought 8 of them. They will be end to end. I have only tested them because I am still painting the hallway walls. I bought double sided tape to keep them in place, but they are non skid and I don't think I will need the tape.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Goodwine

customer_reviews.title: Really cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo slats composing this mat are very narrow, thin, and make crunching noises when you walk on them. I've had mine for a couple of months and it's already starting to splinter. It's pretty cheap..but you get what you pay for, right??
customer_reviews.author: NorthEast81

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a door mouse
customer_reviews.text: It's my fault for not really paying attention to the sizing and when you're impulse buying numbers don't mean much. I saw the picture and it looked like a larger one I was going to replace this with that I kept by my door. This would be great for the entry of a door mouse's house or even Tom Thumb. But for normal people, it's itsy bitsy and not even big enough for in front of your sink or getting out of the shower. If you rolled it up, it could pass for an ancient papyrus scroll. Overall the quality is okay, too. Thin strips of wood guled to canvas.
customer_reviews.author: KaliMau

customer_reviews.title: TOOOO shiny!
customer_reviews.text: I do not expect it to last; shiny, tacky looking thing.
customer_reviews.author: CHEETAH

customer_reviews.title: It's good for floor, not for carpet.
customer_reviews.text: I miss bought this for my mattress xD, all in all, the quality is good, it provided some comfort for me when it's in hot summer. I'll give it a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for over a year and it’s been peed on by my dogs and used endlessly. Always cleans up beautifully and looks beautiful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Best Mat Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Mat Ever! Purchased this mat July 2015 and placed at our kitchen sink and only this year (3 years later!) has the outer fabric edging started to deteriorate. (Note: our kitchen has a skylight so the mat is exposed to filtered UV sun light everyday which is prob why the fabric is turning to dust.) Every mat I've ever tried has looked like crap after a few months of use and washings. This mat can be vacuumed and mopped and doesn't need to be thrown in a washer. The bamboo part still looks glossy and new. It has a low profile, corners don't curl up and it feels snug on our ceramic tile so it's not a tripping hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Emily K.

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Slips a little bit on wood floor but I know there’s anti slip things I can get. I still like it for doing dishes (rather get drips on this than the hardwood)
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I guess if you like falling out the shower they work
customer_reviews.text: This slip all over my bathroom floor. There is backing but it’s not very thick/gripping at all. Glad I was the one who fell vs my son.
customer_reviews.author: A Jo

customer_reviews.title: What a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal! This is exactly like the one I had before that cost a lot more money. I plan to put my own stenciled words on it
customer_reviews.author: Marty Dittmar

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, nice padding, sharp looking and believably durable (will update over time). Very happy with this purchase and will buy another (smaller size) soon for the bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Bishop Baconator

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Stays relatively put
customer_reviews.text: Had a small broken board in our kitchen that the landlord did not wish to fix. Put this mat over it so that we don't catch our feet on it. Works great. Stays relatively put. Looks very nice. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lizenheimer

customer_reviews.title: Quality bamboo rug
customer_reviews.text: Such a wonderful experience to receive this. It looks nicely made and blends nicely. I am most pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 kids that thrash my stuff. It has held up. It looks the same as when I got it out of the packaging. It doesn't look as large as I thought, but that's my fault..... I know how to measure, and should have done so. It doesn't get 5 stars because stuff sometimes gets stuck between the slats and I have to use a toothpick and unstick it. But again, refer to the fact that I have children that I believe are decendents of the Tazmanian devil.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal the Pistol

customer_reviews.title: Functional and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and was a little reluctant, but it is working great in our application. It is on the tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: RdHogg

customer_reviews.title: Great for standing desks!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to place under my standing desk. It is very comfortable when standing on with bare feet!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Norman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: The mats are amazing! I love the natural look and the spice it adds to my bathroom! We no longer love the soft shag rugs anymore lol!
customer_reviews.author: Nakeeta Malone

customer_reviews.title: perfect little rug
customer_reviews.text: I live in a house with all wood floors and a lot of animals. These little rugs are excellent. They're inexpensive, easy to clean, and they don't slip. I would highly recommend buying them
customer_reviews.author: stargazer11

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and they are awesome... Easy to clean and have held up really well for a lot longer than an ordinary carpet would. Basically, a quick wipe and it looks good as new... I have one in my entryway and another in front of my kitchen sink. I love these and would buy them again and again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Smell
customer_reviews.text: It smell! The coating smell, and I'm sure this isn't suppose to be like this. I've leave it beside the open window for 3 days, still have that funny chemical smell. Going to return it, never going to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: sakura997

customer_reviews.title: Considering a return.
customer_reviews.text: Much thinner than I expected. Backed with paper, so I wouldn't get it wet, which defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: A C

customer_reviews.title: I am surprised by how much I like this mat
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised by how much I like this mat. It really looks lovely in my bathroom and feels fine with wet feet. I got tired of washing the carpet which leads to the backing falling apart etc. It is easy to wipe off even when the dogs step on it as it just wipes clean. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for a work mat when working on motorhome or car
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time as a work mat when sitting, kneeling or laying down on ground to work on my motorhome or car. This works great when parked on gravel to work on the coach. I've also given this away as a xmas gift to other RV'rs. Stores up small, cleans easily, eliminates pain of kneeling or laying on gravel. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Beres

customer_reviews.title: Oops...it buckled
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but I’ve tripped several times. This will buckle up and pose a tripping hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bamboo mat
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this to replace the bamboo mat I've had in my bathroom for awhile that finally started to splinter. This mat arrived as expected. I will definitely continue to purchase bamboo mats for outside the shower and would recommend them to others. They dry quickly and don't attract the same smell and mildew that fabric mats do.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible toxic smell & Harm for health
customer_reviews.text: The smell is too bad, very disapoint on the toxic smell which makes me feel dizzy. I don't know how Amazon support this kind product sell. They never care about the harm for customers'health? As it is too big, I even cannot return to amzon locker. Feel so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jiayuan Liu

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Treat for the Feet
customer_reviews.text: We live in Oregon with no ventilation in our bathroom, so my honey thinks it's molding, so to prevent that we hang it over the shower door after use in winter and have had no problems. Love the look and ethical use of bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo floor mat
customer_reviews.text: The mat has a very strong smell of polyurethaning, it made my whole kitchen smell like it for days. Don’t get this, not worth the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C

customer_reviews.title: Great in a tiny poorly ventilated bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Great in a tiny poorly ventilated bathroom. Fits under our door jam and doesn’t hold water in. Looks classy too. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We have used these for years. Perfect for our shower, leaves the area clear and dry. They last for a couple years with almost no care.
customer_reviews.author: William Harper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good looking. Skids but not as much as a fabric mat.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOOTING
customer_reviews.text: STAY SAFE .FALLS CAN BE DEADLY . KEEP YHOSE FEET ON THE GROUND
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: I like the long size which covers the area in front ...
customer_reviews.text: Speedy delivery. I like the long size which covers the area in front of the sink and along the stove. Saves the wear and tear on the hardwood floors for splashes and splatter.
customer_reviews.author: G H

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This mat looks lovely on the bathroom floor, so far so good! It doesn’t slip as well
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: A little slick
customer_reviews.text: Slicker than I thought they would be. Shiny rather than matte due to the finish, but attractive enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Warps in sun
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool but warps in the sun. Careful with product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose !
customer_reviews.text: We actually used this on a portion of the interior of our boat. Just cut with a drywall knife and glued it on. So much cheaper than anything else, and it looks great !
customer_reviews.author: Island Time

customer_reviews.title: I love the quality of these mats and their deep color
customer_reviews.text: They slide around a little on my tile, but a little double sided tape and it's no longer an issue. I love the quality of these mats and their deep color. I have one in front of each of the sinks in my master bathroom and couldn't be happier. I don't use them as a bathmat, so I can't comment on their effectiveness that way, but they are great accent pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Juliann

customer_reviews.title: Great Marketing Picture, it Looks Cheap!!
customer_reviews.text: Returned immediately. It really looks cheap, I could not stand to keep it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaira

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fashionable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they were just too big for my area.
customer_reviews.author: Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo floor mat
customer_reviews.text: There's a nice little floor mats just wish they wouldn't slide as easily across the floor other than that they look good easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: chefjuggalo

customer_reviews.title: Useful and pretty on hardwood floor, too slippery on linoleum floor
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, good price, but somewhat disappointing. I use one at my front door, on a hardwood floor, and one at my kitchen sink, on a linoleum floor. The front door mat works well, in that it doesn't slip on the hardwood, and in fact, blends in beautifully. The kitchen sink mat is virtually useless, however, since it barely stays in place. Yes, when I am standing directly on it, it protects the floor from water, but the second I step on or off the mat, it slips. I am going to return the kitchen one and order something sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Blume

customer_reviews.title: The item is great
customer_reviews.text: I like this item it came in good condition good floor mat for the summer
customer_reviews.author: Yvette McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice rug. Great addition to my bathroom. The other one (same) lasted for 7 years!!!!!! Love love love
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: They really give a bathroom a spa like look, I loved it and you don't slide ...
customer_reviews.text: They really give a bathroom a spa like look, I loved it and you don't slide when they get wet. I loved it and bought 3 more for the other bathrooms in different sizes. Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love thid runner
customer_reviews.text: Love thid runner. Has a good backing that does not slip. East cleaning with irobot and wipe off once a week to keep clean. Durability is not known but so far hsppy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great wooden bath mat
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bathroom mat. It doesn't slip or slide, and it doesn't cling to your feet. Easily cleaned, a great alternative to all those rug mats that are out there, and it goes with a variety of bathroom decor.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Quality check??
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color, size, and look of this mat. However, it’s not the best quality. Disappointed that a chunk was missing on the one last slat (see picture) and you can see the bottom of the rug in between some slats.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on the rug From guests in the house. It’s very easy to clean when I am cleaning the bathroom. Would definitely recommend especially at the fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Useful, attractive, but I wish it had a better "grip" on back. seems to slide a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as part of our guest bath spruce up. It looks great and is well made. The guest bath doesn't get that much use but it looks sturdy enough for a regular bath. Easy to clean, I vacuum it. We have not had water on it yet, but I love how well all my bamboo cooking utensils hold up so I can't imagine wet feet will be a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Lori BelmontTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Toxic, cheap and ugly. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Do you like the smell of toxins from China? This "bamboo" mat is for you. There's a reason it's the cheapest bamboo mat on Amazon. Spend a little more money on something that isn't likely to give you cancer. You can pay now, or pay later. This is just another cheap peace of Amazon trash that originated in China.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler of Texas

customer_reviews.title: Not  much of anti-slip
customer_reviews.text: We are constantly having to reposition this mat. But it is better than the cold tile.
customer_reviews.author: Chatty Pants

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this and wish my whole bathroom floor was covered in this stuff. a little piece of luxury.
customer_reviews.author: SS in the Blue Ridge

customer_reviews.title: the tent can get pretty dirty from shoe tracks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for a camping music festival. After four days of camping, the tent can get pretty dirty from shoe tracks. With these, I was able to put one outside the tent, and one directly inside. As long as people kept with the method (i.e. taking their shoes off when entering the tent) it worked wonders! These rinse off nice and easy and can't be beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Nice Surprise for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Small and well finished bamboo mat. I am using two by my master bath sinks. I am very pleased by the look, but it you put them over carpet the slats can be damaged by heeled shoes. If on bare floor they are quite sturdy. The cloth backing is thin and not very absorbent as a bath mat unless you dry off before exit. I plan to buy the longer mat to place under my vanity and move the two smaller ones to my shower and separate bath.
customer_reviews.author: PJStewart

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT recommend this floor mat
customer_reviews.text: Within 3 months, the edges of this rug began to ravel. I tried sewing the fabric trim back into place, this did not work. Eventually, the bamboo cracked in several spots and the rest of the trim is unraveling. It's crafted very cheaply and I am throwing it away now. I would NOT recommend this floor mat.
customer_reviews.author: rex1019

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It's just beautiful. It's exactly as represented and appears to be very well made. Price is reasonable. So very pleased with this purchase. I'm using this to replace my bathroom throw rug with a latex backing. My old rugs never lasted. After a washing or two, the latex would begin to crack and peel. I love that this mat will never have to see the inside of my washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L Barrentine

customer_reviews.title: Handy bath mat
customer_reviews.text: This is handy bath mat for us. I prefer a mat that does not absorb moisture. If you don't mind a little moisture on the mat, this is an economical choice. There are several designs that are more attractive, but we needed a thin mat that would not obstruct the door swing that is nearby. I do wish I had ordered the next size up, as this one is a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of natural wood. The mat is waterproof too and has a non skid back.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: These mats are dangerous with wet feet
customer_reviews.text: Ther mats look fine but DO NOT buy them for use next to a tub or shower! They are very slick. I almost took a fall the first time I stepped out of the shower with wet feet. We are having to buy new mats to place by the tubs and showers. These are not safe!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, has a good backing on it
customer_reviews.text: I love wood and natural products in my bathroom, so when I saw this floor mat, I couldn't resist. It has a backing, is nicely made, good quality Bamboo- nice and level and smooth. Pretty and functional as floor mat in front of our guest bathroom sink area. I love it so much, that I later bought a second Formbu Bath Mat a month later for another room. Great value and craftmanship for your money. :)
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a good buy for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the large and small for my kitchen floor and these are great quality for the price and super easy to clean. They don’t slip on the floor either. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Carley B.

product_meta.title: iDesign Formbu Bamboo Floor Mat Non-Skid, Water-Resistant Runner Rug for Bathroom, Kitchen, Entryway, Hallway, Office, Mudroom, Vanity, 17" x 24", Natural Beige
product_meta.description: Size:17" x 24"| Style Name:Set of 1The iDesign Bamboo Floor Mat Runner is a great accent for simple, fresh bathroom decor. This natural beige bamboo rug brings a fresh, traditional style to any room. The rug comes with a fabric border to prevent sliding across the floor. This water-resistant bath mat is perfect for in front of the shower, bathtub, or vanity, and it can also work well by the kitchen sink, entryway, or in the hallway. To clean, simply wipe down with warm water and mild soap. The iDesign Bamboo Floor Mat Runner measures 17" x 24", the perfect size for your home. With iDesign by InterDesign, you can #LiveSimply every day.
feature_bullets: BAMBOO RUNNER RUG: Bamboo floor mat runner's traditional style perfectly accents any home decor. Ideal for bathroom, mudroom, kitchen, entryway, hallways, office, or in front of your vanity or shower
FUNCTIONAL: Non-skid underside protects your wood, carpet, or tile floors from damage
STYLISH: Modern style with a natural beige finish complements any home decor
WATER-RESISTANT: Made of natural bamboo with water-resistant coating and fabric border
IDEAL SIZE: Bamboo rug measures 17" x 24", perfect for your living space
